title: Red and White Plum Blossoms tradition

content.question: Ogata Korinâ€™s pair of screens titled White and Red Plum Blossoms exemplifies the style of the Japanese Rinpa school because it

choices.label: was created as a luxurious object, intended to appeal to the tastes of a wealthy patron
features calligraphic inscriptions of historical texts, inspired by a rise in patriotic awareness
features imagery with deep religious symbolism, inspired by the rise of new Buddhist teachings
was designed as the model for woodblock prints, intended to be widely distributed

content.answer: was created as a luxurious object, intended to appeal to the tastes of a wealthy patron

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
